sections.intro: The Uniswap Labs team is building products to unlock value through universal exchange. We envision a future where digital economies flourish, and markets are transparent, global, and equitable. Our products ‚Äì the Uniswap Interface, the Uniswap Mobile App, and the Uniswap Extension ‚Äì are powered by the Uniswap Protocol.¬† The protocol is the largest onchain marketplace, with billions of dollars in weekly volume across thousands of tokens on Ethereum and 8+ additional chains. When you join Uniswap, you become part of a team that's reshaping the way value flows on the internet. The Uniswap marketing team is looking for a dynamic, self-starting Community Partner Marketer to join the community team! You‚Äôll help build deeper relationships with many subsets of the Uniswap and larger DeFi community...
responsibilities: Relationship Management and Community Engagement:
Develop and manage 1:1 relationships with key¬† Uniswap community stakeholders and swapper segments, ensuring personalized engagement and their long-term success with Uniswap
Manage and nurture a portfolio of existing DeFi community and partner relationships.
Build and maintain a CRM of these users, ecosystem partners and Uniswap advocates
Communication and Digital Channel Management:
Develop creative approaches to maintaining open lines of communication with each segment of the community.
Oversee digital channels/forums (Slack, Telegram, Discord, etc.) to engage with these different¬† subsets of Uniswap community members.
Facilitate communication and regular updates between partners and internal stakeholders to ensure alignment and transparency.
Planning, Collaboration and Marketing:
Collaborate with content marketers and social teams to develop and execute creative marketing campaigns that align with broader company objectives.
requirements: 5+ years of work experience with 3+ years of community building work
1+ years experience facilitating of digital communication groups
Be a no-task-too-big, no-task-too-small partner in crime to the Uniswap community and marketing team

Crypto native, specifically in the DeFi ecosystem with some technical understanding of the Crypto/DeFi ecosystem, eg follows blockchain tech advancements and market trends; Able to explain token standards and how different DeFi platforms work at a high level
Highly organized systems thinker
Self-starter who prefers operating without a clearly defined playbook
Track record of executing on large projects start-to-finish
Comfortable with change, ability to adapt to new information
NYC based, but willing to travel, up to 15-20%
nice_to_haves: Relationships with key builders and leaders in crypto / web3
Deep in different crypto communities, experience with Discord & Telegram
Experience working on partnerships / collaborations with external partners
Has successfully built & managed relationships on behalf of their company
Has collaborated with different DeFi companies and/or industry builders¬† in different capacities

sections.intro: We are seeking an experienced Growth Marketer to join our team and drive the growth of our consumer web and mobile app. You will be responsible for developing and executing strategies to acquire and retain users, increase engagement, and optimize conversion rates. This role requires a strong background in digital marketing, including expertise in running paid ads, as well as experience managing agency relationships. An added bonus if this individual has experience with designing and running affiliate and incentive based campaigns as well. The ideal candidate should be highly analytical, creative, and results-driven.
responsibilities: Drive new users through paid digital marketing channels: social media advertising, digital ad networks and search ads. This includes running and optimizing always on campaigns, and supporting integrated campaigns.
Conduct thorough analysis of campaign performance and optimize ads to improve key metrics, including conversion rates, click-through rates, and return on ad spend.
Manage relationship with external agency to align paid marketing initiatives with overall marketing goals and KPIs.

Continuously test and iterate on marketing strategies, messaging, and creative assets to drive user acquisition. This includes managing app store presences and SEO optimization of website landing pages.
Collaborate with internal teams, including product, design, and content, to align marketing campaigns and landing pages with overall marketing goals and company brand guidelines
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop, manage, and execute affiliate campaigns and incentive-based programs that align with overall growth goals and strategies.

Track and report key performance indicators (KPIs) across all acquisition channels and provide regular updates to the management team, highlighting successes, challenges, and recommendations. Work with data to implement proper acquisition attribution.
Monitor and analyze user behavior, market trends, and competitor activities to identify growth opportunities and provide actionable insights.
requirements: Experience 5-7 years experience as a Growth Marketer or similar role, preferably in the consumer web and mobile app space.
A track record of running successful paid campaigns (hands on execution).
Experience managing agency relationships and coordinating external partners to achieve marketing objectives.

Strong analytical skills and the ability to derive actionable insights from data to drive decision-making. Solid understanding of A/B testing methodologies and conversion rate optimization (CRO) techniques.
Proficiency in using digital marketing tools and platforms, such as Google Ads, Facebook Business Manager, and marketing automation tools.
Experience with product and business analytics tools such as Amplitude
Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to effectively communicate complex ideas and strategies.
Creative mindset with a demonstrated ability to think outside the box and develop innovative marketing campaigns.
Strong project management skills with the ability to prioritize and manage multiple initiatives simultaneously.
Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills.
nice_to_haves: Minimum full-time salary of $130,000-$145,000. Disclosure in accordance with New York City's Pay Transparency Law. Full Time employees at Uniswap Labs are also eligible for other compensation elements, including equity, tokens, and benefits, dependent on the position type.

responsibilities: Collaborate with team members to achieve goals
Contribute to project planning and execution
Maintain high quality standards in all work
requirements: Relevant experience in the field
Strong communication and collaboration skills
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment

sections.intro: We are seeking a Data Scientist who will work in a highly collaborative and cross-functional setting to empower data-driven decision-making at the company level. This Data Scientist will use analytical skills and machine learning to make better customer experiences. Specifically, they will use knowledge of causal inference and statistics to setup and evaluate experiments, advise the Uniswap Labs team on understanding the drivers of user engagement, and suggest product and business (growth/marketing) directions that could increase future engagement. While keeping a pulse on the product and company, they will predict future changes in business KPIs.
responsibilities: Develop core metrics and create dashboards to track and measure business performance
Design, conduct and analyze experiments such as A/B tests to guide product decisions
Perform exploratory data analyses and build models to distill insights from data and identify new strategic opportunities
Partner with Product, Growth, Research, Engineering and Leadership to inform, influence, support and execute strategy and product and growth decisions
Design and analyze product experiments to guide product launches
Collaborate with multiple subject matter experts to drive new data initiatives, automate business intelligence reporting, and establish best practices
Create growth/marketing attribution logic and measurement system that enables UL to quantify channel performance / ROI and make spend and resource allocation decisions accordingly
Both for product launches as well as ongoing marketing campaigns
Both for product launches as well as ongoing marketing campaigns
requirements: 2+ years of professional work experience
Bachelors/Masters/Ph.D. in quantitative fields (CS, Stats, economics, etc)
Experience with SQL and Python/R
Ability to analyze large data sets in order to quantify performance via metrics or KPIs
Strong communication skills and the ability to present insights to team members in other domains
Ability to prioritize in a highly dynamic start-up environment
An inquisitive mindset and ability to tackle challenges with limited guidance
nice_to_haves: Experience with blockchain data and analytics tools

Minimum full-time salary of $135,000-$165,000. Disclosure in accordance with New York City's Pay Transparency Law. Full Time employees at Uniswap Labs are also eligible for other compensation elements, including equity, tokens, and benefits, dependent on the position type.

sections.intro: The Uniswap Protocol is the largest decentralized trading and automated market making protocol (often called a DEX, ‚ÄúDecentralized Exchange‚Äù) on Ethereum. The Uniswap Labs team was a major contributor to the Uniswap Protocol and now focuses on building a suite of products to support the Uniswap Labs ecosystem. Our team is one of the most impactful in crypto. We are headquartered in SoHo in New York City Hello future interns! We have extended the application, and we will be receiving applications until 5 pm ET on Thursday, 5/2. We'll review your resume and application responses, and we will be in touch if it's a good fit. Thanks for your interest and patience. We are looking for a Marketing Intern to join Uniswap Labs this summer! Reporting to the Content Marketing Lead, you will support an...
responsibilities: Social Listening:¬†Track Uniswap Labs' presence in the news, at events, and across social media. Collaborate with the Marketing team to turn social listening into real-time content opportunities.
Channel Moderation:¬†Develop a point of view on Reddit. Propose a plan to organize and curate user-generated content to help grow the Uniswap community.
Onchain Marketing:¬†Support onchain marketing experiments on Farcaster, including mints, frames, and other avenues to grow the /uniswap channel.
IRL events: Attend and support Uniswap activations throughout the season, capture social content, and help storytell events with the Marketing team.
requirements: Excellent verbal and written communication skills
Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail
A baseline understanding of blockchain technology and crypto
Passion for building IRL and digital community
Experience with video creation and editing, for both short-form and long-form content
Ability to learn quickly and adapt
Must be an undergrad rising junior or above
An eye for a good meme
Love for unicorns :)
Hourly rate of $30. Disclosure in accordance with New York City's Pay Transparency Law.

Our products ‚Äì the Uniswap Interface, the Uniswap Mobile App, and the Uniswap Extension ‚Äì are powered by the Uniswap Protocol.¬† The protocol is the largest onchain marketplace, with billions of dollars in weekly volume across thousands of tokens on Ethereum and 8+ additional chains. When you join Uniswap, you become part of a team that's reshaping the way value flows on the internet. We‚Äôre looking for a curious, creative, and analytical growth marketing specialist to identity and test into new growth opportunities across Uniswap‚Äôs portfolio of products. responsibilities: Own the growth marketing testing roadmap to identify new channels and strategies across the Uniswap platform, from opportunity sizing all the way through launch
Launch test campaigns into new paid acquisition channels like influencers & affiliates
Collaborate with PDE to identify opportunities for growth across SEO and product-led growth (PLG)
Work alongside Product & Content teams to develop our lifecycle marketing strategy across email, push, and in-app notifications
Build out app store optimization (ASO) testing roadmap and perform regular optimizations
Deliver in-depth weekly reporting & analysis for all channels under ownership
Contribute to Go To Market channel strategy and execution for new strategic releases
requirements: 5 years of marketing experience working with technical B2C products, with a strong background in 1-2 core channels
Passionate about working at the cross-section of quantitative and creative marketing
Obsessed with crypto, DeFi, and Web3 as transformative opportunities, with personal or professional experience using a self-custody wallet, engaging with dApps, NFTs, or participating in DAOs
Incredibly clear written communication and desire to document everything
Very organized, able to stay on top of several moving projects at once
Experience with A/B & multivariate testing and a solid understanding of statistics
Understanding of product & marketing KPIs like LTV, ARPU, and ROAS

Minimum full-time salary of $172,000-$191,000. Disclosure in accordance with New York City's Pay Transparency Law. Full Time employees at Uniswap Labs are also eligible for other compensation elements, including equity, tokens, and benefits, dependent on the position type.

responsibilities: User Research:
Design and Execute Research: Lead planning and conduct both qualitative and quantitative research initiatives to develop and continuously refine detailed Uniswap retail user personas.

Collaborate with Data Teams: Partner with research and data science teams to gain deep insights into user segments, monitoring and influencing user behavior and product usage through comprehensive analytics.
Competitive Analysis: Regularly monitor and research competitive products, value propositions, and market positioning, generating weekly reports to inform strategic decisions.
Market Positioning: Collaborate with product and research teams to perform competitive benchmarking and develop effective market positioning strategies.
User Feedback Collection: Gather and analyze user feedback obtained through research to inform product development.

Roadmap Prioritization: Work closely with the Product team to prioritize features and enhancements on the product roadmap, ensuring feedback is effectively communicated to product, design, and engineering teams with clarity and credibility. Unblocks self and others as required to move projects forward.

Strategy Development: Create comprehensive marketing and go-to-market strategies for large product upgrades and releases. Define target audience, positioning and messaging - rooted in clear objectives and insights. Able to delegate tasks to team members and partners, to focus on highest impact strategy work.
Collaboration with Channel Owners: Partner with channel owners to develop and implement acquisition and retention strategies that align with the high level strategy for each release
Content Creation: Develop targeted marketing collateral for various touchpoints, such as events, social media channels, and community platforms like Telegram.
requirements: 8+ years of Product Marketing experience working with technical B2C products, ideally in fintech and/or web3
Obsessed with crypto, DeFi, and Web3 as transformative opportunities, with personal or professional experience using a self-custody wallet, engaging with dApps, NFTs, or participating in DAOs
Ability to lead through influence, develop strong relationships with technical teams, and drive alignment across teams
Incredibly clear written communication and desire to document everything
Very organized, able to stay on top of several moving projects at once

sections.intro: The Uniswap Labs team is building products to unlock value through universal exchange. We envision a future where digital economies flourish, and markets are transparent, global, and equitable. Our products ‚Äì the Uniswap Interface, the Uniswap Mobile App, and the Uniswap Extension ‚Äì are powered by the Uniswap Protocol.¬† The protocol is the largest onchain marketplace, with billions of dollars in weekly volume across thousands of tokens on Ethereum and 11+ additional chains. When you join Uniswap, you become part of a team that's reshaping the way value flows on the internet.
responsibilities: We‚Äôre looking for a detail-oriented, creative content marketer to join the team!

The Content Marketer will help to develop and execute content strategies that drive engagement, growth, and support our overall marketing goals. This person will be responsible for creating, managing, and optimizing a variety of content across different channels and mediums (including blogs, learning resources, product landing pages, and more).

The person in this role is dedicated to making complex concepts simple, focusing on the user, and always starting with ‚Äúwhy‚Äù. You‚Äôll also act as a steward for the Uniswap brand across the organization, helping field copy requests and other types of content requests across the Marketing team.
As the Uniswap brand expands to more and more users, we‚Äôre excited to bring someone on who helps us scale how and where we tell our story to new audiences. ü¶Ñ
We are headquartered in SoHo in New York City and this role will be NYC based.
Content Execution
Develop on engaging educational content that simplifies complex concepts to users that are new to crypto and Uniswap Labs‚Äô products
Support the Growth Marketing team on creating content for landing pages, blog articles, web pages, in-product notifications, banner ads, and more
Improve SEO performance of existing blogs, support articles, and landing pages through content updates & technical optimization, in tandem with Growth Marketer & Customer Experience teams
Monitor and report out on weekly performance of new and existing content pieces
requirements: Must haves
Strong written communication skills
2+ years of experience working as a content marketer, copywriter, or journalist
Be a no-task-too-big, no-task-too-small team member
Strong time management and prioritization skills with a proven track record to execute against deliverables
NYC-based
Experience working with agencies and contractors to build content for brands
Familiarity with Contentful, Framer, Google Search Console, and other comparable marketing platforms
Attention to detail and high bar for quality
Passion for bringing new audiences onchain
nice_to_haves: Experience creating short-form and/or long-form educational video content
Experience developing video screen-capture content, static screenshots, GIFs
Experience working in international markets or on content internationalization efforts
Deep understanding of the crypto ecosystem

Minimum full-time salary of $121,000-$135,000. Disclosure in accordance with New York City's Pay Transparency Law. Full Time employees at Uniswap Labs are also eligible for other compensation elements, including equity, tokens, and benefits, dependent on the position type.

title: MBA Intern - Business Operations and Strategy

sections.intro: The Uniswap Labs team is building products to unlock value through universal exchange. We envision a future where digital economies flourish, and markets are transparent, global, and equitable. Our products ‚Äì the Uniswap Interface, the Uniswap Mobile App, and the Uniswap Extension ‚Äì are powered by the Uniswap Protocol.¬† The protocol is the largest onchain marketplace, with billions of dollars in weekly volume across thousands of tokens on Ethereum and 8+ additional chains. When you join Uniswap, you become part of a team that's reshaping the way value flows on the internet.
responsibilities: We are seeking a highly analytical and strategic MBA Intern to join our Business Operations team for Summer 2025. In this role, you will work closely with cross-functional teams, including Data, Product, and Engineering, to drive critical business initiatives and contribute to Uniswap‚Äôs growth. This is a unique opportunity to gain hands-on experience in the DeFi space while making a meaningful impact at one of the most influential companies in crypto.¬†The internship will take place in New York City at our office in Soho during the summer of 2025.

Hello future interns! We will be receiving applications until 5 pm ET on Thursday, 3/27. We'll review your resume and application responses, and we will be in touch if it's a good fit. Thanks for your interest and patience.
Partner with functional leadership to analyze business performance, identify opportunities for growth, and develop data-driven recommendations.
Conduct market research and competitive analysis to inform strategic decisions and product development.
Support operational improvements by designing and implementing scalable processes.
Collaborate with Product and Engineering teams to enhance business insights as they relate to product planning
Assist in financial modeling, forecasting, and key metric tracking.
Contribute to strategic initiatives such as partnerships, new market expansion, and ecosystem development.
Present findings and recommendations to senior stakeholders.
requirements: Currently pursuing an MBA.
2+ years of prior experience in management consulting, investment banking, venture capital, private equity, tech, or fintech.
Strong analytical skills, with experience in data analysis, financial modeling, and market research.
Excellent problem-solving abilities and strategic thinking.
Exceptional communication and presentation skills.
A proactive, entrepreneurial mindset with a passion for Web3, DeFi, and emerging technologies.
Experience in crypto, blockchain, or financial services is a plus but not required.
Hourly rate of $70. Disclosure in accordance with New York City's Pay Transparency Law.

responsibilities: Strategic Planning & Execution
Lead annual and quarterly planning, ensuring all teams are aligned with strategic goals.
Track and monitor goals/roadmaps to ensure alignment with Uniswap mission & strategy.
Facilitate cross-functional coordination, resolving dependencies and bottlenecks.
Collaborate with department heads to drive execution and accountability.
Be a positive force for operational excellence, improving company and cross-functional velocity through collaboration, communication and process
Executive Support & Communication
Prepare the COO for policy and business development meetings, offering market and partner context, data + insights and key talking points.
Represent the COO in meetings, ensuring their voice and perspective are accurately reflected.
Draft communications and documents on behalf of the COO, maintaining consistency in tone and messaging.
requirements: 8+ years of experience in operations, strategy, business development or a similar role, preferably in a high-growth environment.
Strong track record of leading cross-functional initiatives and managing company-wide planning.
Exceptional written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to write and represent executive leadership effectively.
Excellent judgment, decision-making skills, and the ability to facilitate discussions and build consensus.
Proven ability to manage multiple projects in a dynamic, fast-paced environment.

Minimum full-time salary of $230,000 - $255,000.¬†Disclosure in accordance with New York City's Pay Transparency Law.¬†Full Time employees at Uniswap Labs are also eligible for other compensation elements, including equity, tokens, and benefits, dependent on the position type.

sections.intro: As an integral marketing team member, you will be responsible for planning and executing cross-channel marketing campaigns to drive user acquisition, engagement, and retention for our apps. You will work closely with a paid-focused growth marketer, partner marketing, and social teams. This role requires a strong understanding of web2 and web3 marketing strategies, exceptional writing skills, experience with product positioning, and the ability to drive creative messaging and visual assets. This role is responsible for delivering and maintaining a high bar of brand quality and brand alignment across all campaign activities.
responsibilities: Create and implement brand and user acquisition integrated marketing campaigns that align with go-to-market strategy and drive towards our growth and brand awareness goals.

Produce compelling and engaging content for various marketing channels including social media, emails, infographics, blog posts, advertisements. Write punchy, brand aligned copy to align with campaigns, events and activations.
Own, in partnership with Design, company website, product pages and campaign landing pages from a marketing perspective.
Collaborate with and provide artistic and creative direction to Design team partners to create effective marketing materials and campaigns

Be the steward of how our brand shows up in marketing assets across integrated campaigns, website landing pages and paid marketing. Provide creative direction and identify opportunities to up level brand quality and story telling across all marketing activities.
Manage, write and grow monthly email newsletter. Determine appropriate target audience, frequency and goals.
Monitor and analyze campaign performance across multiple channels, including email, social media, and web. Craft and adjust strategy based on performance.
Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices to ensure our marketing efforts remain current and effective
requirements: 3+ years of experience in marketing, with a focus on consumer apps; bonus fintech or crypto applications
Proven track record of creating strong copy writing, creative collaboration with design teams and effective story telling
Provide track record of developing and executing successful marketing campaigns
Strong project management skills and attention to detail
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams

Minimum full-time salary of $130,000-$145,000. Disclosure in accordance with New York City's Pay Transparency Law. Full Time employees at Uniswap Labs are also eligible for other compensation elements, including equity, tokens, and benefits, dependent on the position type.

Uniswap Labs' Full-Time employee benefits include unlimited and encouraged time off, company-paid medical, dental, & vision for you and your dependents, gym subsidy, 401(k) participation, annual $1,500 education stipend, up to 16 weeks paid parental leave, home office setup stipend for remote employees and daily lunches at NY headquarters (all benefits are subject to applicable taxes and based on eligibility).

Uniswap Labs is proud to be an equal opportunity employer (EEO). sections.intro: The Uniswap Labs team is building products to unlock value through universal exchange. We envision a future where digital economies flourish, and markets are transparent, global, and equitable. Our products ‚Äì the Uniswap Interface, the Uniswap Mobile App, and the Uniswap Extension ‚Äì are powered by the Uniswap Protocol.¬† The protocol is the largest onchain marketplace, with billions of dollars in weekly volume across thousands of tokens on Ethereum and 8+ additional chains. When you join Uniswap, you become part of a team that's reshaping the way value flows on the internet. The Uniswap marketing team is looking for a dynamic, self-starting Community Partner Marketer to join the community team! You‚Äôll help build deeper relationships with many subsets of the Uniswap and larger DeFi community...
responsibilities: Relationship Management and Community Engagement:
Develop and manage 1:1 relationships with key¬† Uniswap community stakeholders and swapper segments, ensuring personalized engagement and their long-term success with Uniswap
Manage and nurture a portfolio of existing DeFi community and partner relationships.
Build and maintain a CRM of these users, ecosystem partners and Uniswap advocates
Communication and Digital Channel Management:
Develop creative approaches to maintaining open lines of communication with each segment of the community.
Oversee digital channels/forums (Slack, Telegram, Discord, etc.) to engage with these different¬† subsets of Uniswap community members.
Facilitate communication and regular updates between partners and internal stakeholders to ensure alignment and transparency.
Planning, Collaboration and Marketing:
Collaborate with content marketers and social teams to develop and execute creative marketing campaigns that align with broader company objectives.
requirements: 5+ years of work experience with 3+ years of community building work
1+ years experience facilitating of digital communication groups
Be a no-task-too-big, no-task-too-small partner in crime to the Uniswap community and marketing team

Crypto native, specifically in the DeFi ecosystem with some technical understanding of the Crypto/DeFi ecosystem, eg follows blockchain tech advancements and market trends; Able to explain token standards and how different DeFi platforms work at a high level

Deep in different crypto communities, experience with Discord & Telegram
Experience working on partnerships / collaborations with external partners
Has successfully built & managed relationships on behalf of their company
Has collaborated with different DeFi companies and/or industry builders¬† in different capacities

sections.intro: We‚Äôre looking for an enthusiastic, self-motivated Social Media Specialist to reach audiences online and creatively tell the story of the transformative possibilities of crypto, Defi, and Web3. The Social Media Specialist will collaborate with the team to launch social campaigns, creating content across all platforms ‚Äî including Twitter, TikTok, YouTube, and Instagram. This role will collaborate with internal teams including community, marketing, product, engineering, design, and research. The Social Media Specialist will manage multiple social campaigns simultaneously, use data driven strategies to reach users, and craft thoughtful strategies that will serve unique audiences. The Social Media Specialist should be web3 obsessed and native to Twitter, with a willingness to seek out emerging ...
responsibilities: Execute our overall social strategy from concepting ideas, to coordinating among teams, to executing, to creatively bringing messages to life
Own content creation and execution from start to finish for all platforms, in coordination with multiple teams and while maintaining Uniswap's distinct brand tone
Coordinate across the organization to develop a deep understanding of product offerings and help plan innovative go-to-market plans for new announcements
Develop social media calendar for all platforms, which is integrated with communications and product timelines
Cultivate relationships with users across platforms
Identify growth opportunities across platforms
Run analytics and develop insights that are relevant to our core audiences and integrate findings into engagement planning
requirements: 1-3 years of experience running multiple social media platforms for an organization or agency
Obsessed with crypto, DeFi, and Web3 as transformative opportunities
Proven ability to use social media to maintain or build a brand, with experience in everything from explainer threads, to product marketing, to playful memes
Excellent copywriting skills and ability to develop and adapt tone of voice
Deep understanding of social media platforms, especially Twitter, Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube
Experience with social analytics tools like Hootsuite to inform decision making
Graphic design experience and familiarity with basic design tools to create image content

responsibilities: Strategic Leadership: Drive multiple strategic initiatives from scoping to implementation, aligning with Uniswap Labs' goals and broader company strategy

sections.intro: We are seeking a Data Scientist who will work in a highly collaborative and cross-functional setting to empower data-driven decision-making at the company level. This Data Scientist will use analytical skills and machine learning to make better customer experiences. Specifically, they will use knowledge of causal inference and statistics to setup and evaluate experiments, advise the Uniswap Labs team on understanding the drivers of user engagement, and suggest product directions that could increase future engagement. While keeping a pulse on the product and company, they will predict future changes in business KPIs.
responsibilities: Develop core metrics and create dashboards to track and measure business performance
Design, conduct and analyze experiments such as A/B tests to guide product decisions
Monitor competitor and broader market metrics, including other products and networks
Perform explorative data analyses and build models to distill insights from data and identify new strategic opportunities
Partner with Product, Research, Engineering and Leadership to inform, influence, support and execute strategy and product decisions
Design and analyze product experiments to guide product launches.
Collaborate with multiple subject matter experts to drive new data initiatives, automate business intelligence reporting, and establish best practices
Lead projects to completion
requirements: Bachelors/Masters/Ph.D. in quantitative fields (CS, Stats, economics, etc) with 2+ years work experience
Experience with SQL and Python/R
Ability to analyze large data sets in order to quantify performance via metrics or KPIs
Strong communication skills and the ability to present insights to team members in other domains
Ability to prioritize in a highly dynamic start-up environment
An inquisitive mindset and ability to tackle challenges with limited guidance
nice_to_haves: Experience with blockchain data and analytics tools
